hooks.command:
#!/bin/bash
input=$(cat)
cmd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_input.command')
if echo "$cmd" | grep -qE 'gh pr create'; then
  output=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.tool_output.output // ""')
  pr_url=$(echo "$output" | grep -oE 'https://github.com/[^/]+/[^/]+/pull/[0-9]+')
  if [ -n "$pr_url" ]; then
    echo "[Hook] PR created: $pr_url" >&2
  fi
fi
echo "$input"
